titleStmt.title: Universal love being an epistle given forth by the Spirit of God / through his suffering servant, Will. Gibson ; and is to be sent into all nations and countries where the Lord God hath rais'd a people to worship him in spirit and in truth ; to be read in his pure fear in their publick assemblies and private families for their edification and comfort.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, William, 1629-1684.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
